trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around May 29th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked like a dark red cloud came closer and hung out a min or two and took off and dissappeared in about 5 secs. Thought the object was a storm cloud was sitting in my hot tub it was dark but there was no other clouds around.
